text: Ba der partoftani mohhoi harom afzunī dar kufr ast va saʙaʙi gumrohii kofiron. Onho jak sol on mohro halol meşumurdand va jak sol harom, to ʙo on şumor, ki Xudo harom kardaast, muvofiq joʙand. Pas on ciro, ki Xudo harom karda, halol meşumorand. Kirdori nopisandaşon dar nazaraşon orosta gardida va Xudo kofironro hidojat namekunad
